main.description: GohanGo!! is a collection of 8,866 algorithmically generated NFTs living on the Ethereum blockchain. Every GohanGo!! NFT features a different set of unique attributes. Every attribute is designed and is meticulously hand-drawn by our Artist inspired by their own culture and stories.

home.backstories:
Once upon a time, there is a monkey named Gohan. He loves rice, all kinds of rice! His dream is to try out all the rice dishes across the world.

Hainanese Chicken Rice, Curry Rice, Tempura Don, Risotto, Mango Sticky Rice, Golden Fried Rice, Ekiben. You name it, he had it on his bucket list! But what he most in love with is the warm bowl of soy sauce drizzled white rice.

If you are a rice people, join GohanGo!!

promo.title: Ingenious Art
promo.description: Our artist took inspiration from her own culture and identity, every attribute is uniquely designed and delicately hand-drawn. Gohan the monkey is also inspired by the true episodes of our creator. Our motivating reason why we created Gohan is to remember the gorgeous moment in our lives and to offer an opportunity to heal.

promo.title:
Community
First
promo.description: Always put our community first. Keep building and serving our community is the #1 thing of GohanGo!!. Our mission is to build up the funniest and healthiest community in the Ethereum NFT community.

promo.title: Something Special
promo.description: We don't want to be yet another NFT project, we want to be "the" NFT project on the Ethereum blockchain. We want to support those who are in need in the world, thatâ€™s why a portion of our royalties will be used for charity.

steps.title: Start
steps.headline: Start the project
description: Launch the official Discord server and Twitter account
Continue to create high quality hand-drawn artwork
Develop functionality for NFT creation and minting

steps.title: Community
steps.headline: Building the community
description: Continue to develop and expand our community
More Discord functionality building: incoming games and special events

steps.title: More
steps.headline: More and more to come
description: Holders exclusive tools building (Rarity chart, marketplace...)

questions.question: Wen, how and where?
questions.answer: We are scheduled to go live with our NFT project on March 23th on the Ethereum blockchain. You will only be able to MINT them on our official website. Please follow our Twitter account and join our Discord server to get the latest updates from us!

questions.question: Why should I but GohanGo!! NFT?
questions.answer: The emergence of NFTs offers an opportunity for unknown artist to share their aesthetic pieces to the whole world! So you are not only just getting a piece of JPEG, you are getting a unique NFT that was hand-drawn and randomly assembled by our talented artist. They are all living on the Ethereum blockchain, owning one of the GohanGo!! NFTs means you get access to community-wide events, giveaways and early access to any further generations and drops.

questions.question: Which GohanGo!! NFT will I get?
questions.answer: No one knows! They will all be distributed randomly, whether good or bad. The good thing is all the 8,866 NFTs are unique, they all look pretty and special!

questions.question: How much will the mint cost?

base.warningMsg: You will be able to connect your wallet and mint your GohanGo!! NFT when mint is live, thanks!
